Welcome to
Cyber Quest

A cyber security competition and training
for students across the UAE. Play your
part in defending the nation.

Sign Up

Cyber Quest is an integrated training event and hacking competition provided by Signals Intelligence Agency to raise awareness and identify the next generation of Cyber Security Experts. Take part and discover more than you imagine about networking, cyber security and what really happens online. Join the Quest now to draw back the curtain on the 21st century’s digital battleground.

Apply Now

Cyber Quest is
one of a kind

Cybersecurity has never been more important for the UAE and the world. From denial of service, to ransomware, to data leaks, Cyber Defenders are needed everywhere – wifi hackers, password crackers, reverse engineers and forward thinkers.
